dcterms:description: FEVEROUS is a dataset consisting of fact-checking data with various challenges such as Numerical Reasoning, Entity Disambiguation, and Multi-hop Reasoning.
dcterms:title: FEVEROUS

dcterms:description: HOVER is a challenging multi-hop fact-checking dataset, with a maximum hop count of 4, attributed to the increased number of hops and longer evidence provided, most of which contain distracting information.
dcterms:title: HOVER
